bioconda.name: tracer
bioconda.summary: Tracer is a program for analysing the trace files generated by Bayesian MCMC runs (that is, the continuous parameter values sampled from the chain). It can be used to analyse runs of BEAST, MrBayes, LAMARC and possibly other MCMC programs.

biocontainers.name: tracer
biocontainers.summary: Graphical tool for visualization and diagnostics of mcmc (markov chain monte carlo) output. it can read output files from mrbayesand beast.

biotools.summary: Graphical tool for visualization and diagnostics of MCMC (Markov chain Monte Carlo) output. It can read output files from MrBayesand BEAST.

bioschemas.name: Tracer
bioschemas.summary: Graphical tool for visualization and diagnostics of MCMC (Markov chain Monte Carlo) output. It can read output files from MrBayesand BEAST.
